body.name: Yarra-Decor Bedside Touch Control Table Lamp Nightstand Lamp with USB A+C Charging Ports & AC Outlet 3-Way Dimmable Desk Lamp with Fabric Shade for Bedroom Living Room(Bulb Included)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 3 hrs 38 mins
features: ✔️【BRIGHTEN UP YOUR SPACE】- Its minimalist design makes it the perfect desk lamp for your home office or bedroom lamp to enhance your decor. Whether you're working late at your desk or reading a book in bed, this desk lamp will give you a warm and comfortable atmosphere.

✔️【VERSATILE HOME DECOR】- This LED touch control table lamp's sleek and minimalist design makes it perfect as a bedroom or desk lamp for any room in your home. With a simple touch, you can effortlessly turn the bedside lamp on or off, making it easy to find your way in the dark. No more fumbling around for switches or chains!

✔️【CHARGE & STREAMLINE WITH EASE】- The touch control desk lamp features built-in USB A and USB C (5V/2.1A) ports and an AC outlet (120V) that allows you to conveniently charge your mobile phones, kindles, headsets, diffusers, speakers, and other electronics. Whether the light is on or off, you can keep your table organized and clutter-free with this solution.

✔️【3 WAY SMOOTH DIMMABLE TOUCH CONTROL】- The dimmable bedside table lamp offers 3 level brightness options (Low, Medium, High). Just simply tap on anywhere of the metal base to adjust the lighting to meet your different needs. Nightlight for a steady sleep or nursing. Accent lighting for a warm mood. Proper high comfortable brightness for studying or working. Super handy to operate.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Outstanding Lamp! A Must Buy!
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased my second bedside touch lamp, and I can confidently say it's a solid 10 out of 10 in terms of appearance, value for money, color options, and charging capabilities. Here's why:Firstly, when I upgraded my phone to the iPhone 14 Pro, I knew my old standard touch light wouldn't cut it anymore. This lamp not only meets but exceeds my expectations. It offers multiple ports, including two USB ports for charging other devices and an actual plug-in for my new phone. It's a lifesaver for keeping all my gadgets charged and within reach.The sensitivity of this lamp is fantastic. A simple tap anywhere on the lamp, and it responds instantly, turning on or off as needed. It's incredibly convenient and user-friendly.But it's not just about functionality; this lamp is aesthetically pleasing as well. The different light tones it offers add a beautiful ambiance to any room. Whether I'm working in my office or relaxing at home, the warm and cool light options are perfect for setting the right mood.I've owned both lamps for a while now, and I haven't encountered any issues whatsoever. They are reliable and have become an essential part of my daily routine.In conclusion, I can't recommend this bedside touch lamp highly enough. It's the perfect combination of style, convenience, and functionality. If you're in the market for a lamp that ticks all the boxes, look no further. This lamp is outstanding and worth every penny.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Just what I was looking for my office reading area.
reviews.reviewText: I love that you have 3 level of soft light and the shade is nicer then expected. Having more area to charge devices is a bonus. Would buy again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works exactly as I wanted
reviews.reviewText: perfect small lamp. touch response is good and chargers work great. no worries getting these.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Compact but bright
reviews.reviewText: I was looking for a smaller lamp along with the ability to tap it off. I hate leaning over to turn the lamp switch off. This lamp does the job well and is bright enough. It is a very light lamp but sturdy enough. I may buy another shade that is a little bit bigger. I like the convenience of using the charging capabilities too.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 10, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I bought mine for my handicapped father who spends a lot of time in bed. This is the perfect bedside lamp. You literally just have to touch it and you have light. Being adjustable makes it even better. I love it and highly recommend it. It is very stylish also.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great lamp for the price
reviews.reviewText: Very easy to put together. The lamp seems to be of high quality for the price. The light has three brightness settings, and you adjust it by tapping the base. There is a traditional USB port, a USB-C port, and one 120 volt outlet. The only thing to note is that this lamp works well for a desk or night stand. Even at the highest brightness level it will not be good for brightening an entire room, but if you want something for a small area, like your desk or a table, it is great for that. The lowest setting is perfect for a night stand.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice quality for the price.
reviews.reviewText: I shopped Amazon forever, hoping to not get cheap Chinese junk. These are good quality. The lighting is low, need and high. And it is. Not all low like the cheapo junk. They are heavy enough. They have art form. I bought two. Nice product. I highly recommend for the bedroom.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars 5 out of six is ok, I guess. Bad one is disappointing!
reviews.reviewText: I bought my 5th and 6th of these lamps. They are a medium sized lamp with a slim profile and ports for devices and a plug.One of the 2 lamps in this order doesn’t work. It didn’t work with a new dimmable bulb either. 🫤Since we recently moved, and wanted more lamps because company is coming to stay with us for an early holiday, it’s disappointing.I’ll need to find out where to return (defective) Amazon stuff in north San Antonio, TX.
